duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform and Present Pit Studies using drones, mobile telematics, Historian, and ride alongs to measure site-specific equipment performance of Loaders, Excavators, Haul Trucks, and Primary Crushers.

Develop and Provide Training such as HALOS, for plant operations management/supervisors. Establish benchmarks and implement loading methods/training for proper working pit floors. Develop mobile equipment operator standards.
Measure and correct haul road defects; such as, grade, crown, slope/crossfall drainage, width, berms, etc. Measure and analyze loading and hauling cycle times.
Assist plant supervision with developing proper haul roads, working floors, and implementing pit improvement projects.
Work with Mine Planning and Drilling & Blasting support groups to identify and implement short term pit development projects.
Audit mobile equipment safety, operating practices, and utilization.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Engineering OR 5 years mining, operating, or heavy mobile equipment experience in the aggregate industry
